remarks: Equivalent wff's yield equal operation class abstractions (deduction rule).  (Contributed by NM, 21-Feb-2004.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 24-Jun-2014.)
statement:
oprabbid.1 $e |- F/ x ph $.
oprabbid.2 $e |- F/ y ph $.
oprabbid.3 $e |- F/ z ph $.
oprabbid.4 $e |- ( ph -> ( ps <-> ch ) ) $.
oprabbid $p |- ( ph -> { <. <. x , y >. , z >. | ps } = { <. <. x , y >. , z >. | ch } ) $.
$d x z $.
$d y z $.
